Home.Title: Hello everyone and welcome to our wedding website !
Home.Text: We’ve created this space to share all the details of our big day⁠: venue schedule, dress code, and more⁠. You’ll also find our top recommendations to explore Porto-Vecchio⁠: must-visit restaurants, stunning beaches, and exciting activities⁠. We can’t wait to celebrate this magical day with you. Stay tuned—surprises await !

DressCode.Title: DRESS CODE :
DressCode.Text: Come dressed in white from head to toe! Opt for light and elegant outfits to complement the chic and relaxed beach atmosphere. Don’t forget to bring your swimsuits and hats! It might be very hot.

Ceremony.Title: SATURDAY : RELIGIOUS CEREMONY
Ceremony.WhereLocation: Saint John the Baptist Church, 2-8 Rue Joseph Pietri Maire, 20137 Porto-Vecchio

Transport.Text: <bold>Transport :</bold> Please arrange your own transportation to the church.
Transport.ItalicText: After the religious ceremony, we invite you to return to your respective hotels. A shuttle will then pick you up for the evening. (Not all hotels are served, see the page <0>"Accommodations"</0> for more information)

DressCode.Title: DRESS CODE :
DressCode.Girls: Ladies, bring out your most beautiful cocktail dresses. Leave your pastels in the closet and opt for vibrant shades that will make this day shine even more.
DressCode.Boys: Gentlemen, dazzle us with your elegant suits paired with your finest ties.

Celebration.Title: SATURDAY : THE CELEBRATION
Celebration.WhereLocation: Casadelmar Beach, Presqu’île du Benedettu, 20137 Porto-Vecchio

Transport.Text: <bold>Transport :</bold> Shuttle service between your hotel and Plage Casadelmar
Transport.ItalicText: (Not all hotels are served, see the page <0>"Accommodations"</0> for more information)

Celebration.Parking: <bold>Parking :</bold> If you wish to attend the evening with your own car, the La Plage Casadelmar hotel has parking available.

DressCode.Title: DRESS CODE :
DressCode.Girls: Ladies, bring out your most beautiful cocktail dresses. Leave your pastels in the closet and opt for vibrant shades that will make this day shine even more. Remember to bring flat shoes to set the dance floor on fire!
DressCode.Boys: Gentlemen, dazzle us with your elegant suits paired with your finest ties.

Sunday.Title: SUNDAY : BRUNCH
Sunday.WhereLocation: Casadelmar Beach, Presqu’île du Benedettu, 20137 Porto-Vecchio

DressCode.Title: DRESS CODE :
DressCode.Text: Dolce Vita theme, let your imagination run wild

Services.Title: SERVICES
Services.SubTitle: Baby-sitters:
Services.SitterDescription: We have arranged for a babysitter to take care of your little ones so you can fully enjoy your evening.

Album.Title: ALBUM
Album.Description: Here, you can share your photos and videos of the wedding by clicking on the cloud. You can also leave comments by opening an item
